checks.name: storage_encrypted
checks.title: Check if RDS instances storage is encrypted.
checks.risk: If not enabled sensitive information at rest is not protected.

checks.name: auto_minor_version_upgrade
checks.title: Ensure RDS instances have minor version upgrade enabled.
checks.risk: Auto Minor Version Upgrade is a feature that you can enable to have your database automatically upgraded when a new minor database engine version is available. Minor version upgrades often patch security vulnerabilities and fix bugs and therefore should be applied.

remediation.text: Enable auto minor version upgrade for all databases and environments.

checks.name: no_public_access
checks.title: Ensure there are no Public Accessible RDS instances.
checks.risk: Publicly accessible databases could expose sensitive data to bad actors.
